content: laurence by vicky chan laurence is a perfect blanket for the special little one a simple knit with an eyelet stitch pattern which depending on how you orient the blanket translates to dainty blooms whimsical abodes or playful arrowheads while the sample is knitted in dk weight yarn the blanket is highly scalable and can be made with any yarn weight why not make a bigger lap blanket to baby yourself www ravelry com/designers/vicky-chan laurence 2 of 3 skill level abbreviations easy bobble bind off finished measurements co cast on 90 cm / 35½ wide 76 cm / 30 long k mkr s k m n a it rker s yarn n multiplier number chosen for co pm place marker dk weight yarn 900m/985yd repeat s repeat s note blanket can be made with different yarn weight and is rs right side sm slip marker scaleable yardage and needle size may vary st s stitch es needles yo yarn over ws wrong side 4 mm/ us 6 60 cm/ 24 circular for working flat sts to be worked/repeated as a set notions stitch guide 2 stitch markers tapestry needle k2tog knit 2 together as if they are one stitch gauge skp slip 1 knitwise k1 pass slipped st over 23 sts x 35 row = 10 cm/ 4 in eyelet pattern blocked garter st knit on rs and ws exact gauge is not critical copyright © 2020 by vicky chan all rights reserved v250502 reproduction of this pattern for distribution or sale as well as the sale or commercial use of items made from this pattern are prohibited without the express consent of the designer laurence 3 of 3 instructions using long-tail cast on co 205 sts or multiple n of 12 row 9 & 11 same as row 5 + 17 + 20 sts where n x 12 + 17 sts are for the body and row 13 & 15 same as row 1 the 20 sts are for the 10-st garter border on either side row 17 knit to first mkr sm k8 yo k2tog k10 to 9 note sample shown has n=14 increasing/decreasing sts before 2nd mkr yo k2tog k7 sm knit to end the n value by 1 will increase/decrease co st count by 12 and blanket width by about 5cm/2 if knit to gauge row 19 knit to first mkr sm k6 skp yo k1 yo k2tog specified on page 2 k7 to 11 sts before 2nd mkr skp yo k1 yo k2tog k6 sm knit to end first garter section row 21 knit to first mkr sm k5 skp yo k3 yo k2tog knit 15 row k5 to 2nd mkr sm knit to end eyelet pattern section row 23 & 25 same as row 19 pm 10 sts in from either edge to demarcate the garter row 27 same as row 1 border before beginning eyelet pattern section for charted instruction of row 1-28 see pattern chart end with a ws row repeat these
